sources.name: Washington State Open Data Portal
sources.notes: Primary source - uses SODA (Socrata Open Data API). Free, no authentication required for public datasets.

sources.name: Washington State Fiscal Information
sources.notes: Official state source. Request download via email to leap@leg.wa.gov. Contains 5 years of data.

sources.name: GovSalaries.com
sources.notes: Third-party aggregator. UW has ~57,300 records, EWU has ~2,657 records. Use as backup/supplement.

legalBasis: All salary data is public record under RCW 42.56.210 (Washington Public Records Act)
exclusions: Names withheld for domestic violence victims
